fields.summary: footer too high

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
# Setup proxy server (http://localhost:8081/fisheye) for FishEye/Crucible instance (http://localhost:8060/fisheye)
# Leave *Site URL* as default (at Administration > Server Settings), therefore it will be set to http://localhost:8081/fisheye/.
# Create any review and trigger the action to send email out.
# The notification email is referring to http://localhost:8060/fisheye, rather than http://localhost:8081/fisheye/.

Workaround:
# Set the value of *Site URL* to proxy URL (http://localhost:8081/fisheye) explicitly.
fields.summary: Email notification is not referring to Proxy URL when Site URL is set to default

fields.description: For example, If I'm a reviewer, all I want to know is when I've been assigned and when someone replies to one of my comments.  If I'm an author, I want to know pretty much everything, except the actions I took.
fields.summary: Enable/disable email notifications based on one's role on the review

fields.description:
Passwords are not encrypted in:

* _<FISHEYE_INST>\config.xml_
* _<FISHEYE_INST>\var\plugins\user\*.config_ file

It should include an encryption scheme for better security.
fields.summary: Encrypt all passwords stored on the file system

fields.description:
I used to be able to invoke a URL like this:

https://svn.atlassian.com/atlaseye/cru/CR-PL-19/viewfile/CFR-27739

On ataseye (2.0 snapshot) this URL returns 404. Is there a replacement for viewing file in a review?
fields.summary: viewfile action missing

fields.description: I have a file that has been added to CVS, which I then modified and committed again.  I want to create a code review for that whole file.  When I search for the file in "Search" and add all the changesets, it adds the file as "modified", showing the differences from version 1.1 to the newest version.  It should show the file as "added", and include the latest version in the review.
fields.summary: Adding all changesets for new files with multiple commits should show file as "Added", not "Modified"

fields.description: A link that takes me to "No matching changesets" serves no purpose - why not remove the link.
fields.summary: "Earlier changeset" and "Later changeset" links should be grayed out when earliest/latest already listed.

fields.description:
Currently, there is no creator label in a review so we can't identify who is the creator of the review. It would be good to include the creator label.

The alternative way currently is to use the custom filter to filter the review based on the 'creator'.
fields.summary: Include the creator label in a review

fields.description:
When a user wants to add several consecutive changesets into a single review, the user has to tick on each checkbox one by one. 

It would be good if they are allowed to specify a range of changesets (e.g. 3-10) into a review.
fields.summary: Quicker Way for allow user to add range of changesets into a review

fields.description: seeing these images (see attachment) for the first time in this review https://studio.atlassian.com/source/cru/CR-AG-385, i thought they were part of crucible. images under review should blend in with the crucible ui less, perhaps by adding a border or something
fields.summary: Images in review blend in to crucible

fields.description: The external database feature is set to be included in the 2.0 release but is targeted to the MySQL and Postgres databases.  We would like the option to port to a MS SQL Server.  Our current infrastructure is set with SQL Server and all of our other Atlassian tools (JIRA, Bamboo, Confluence) are backed by this infrastructure.
fields.summary: Support MS SQLServer database
test

Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
at com.cenqua.crucible.revision.source.RepositorySource.getLatestRevIdent(RepositorySource.java:434)
at com.cenqua.crucible.revision.source.RepositorySource.isAnySuccessorRevisions(RepositorySource.java:424)
at com.cenqua.crucible.view.FRXDO.isAnySuccessorRevisions(FRXDO.java:219)
at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor247.invoke(Unknown Source)
at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:597)
at javax.el.BeanELResolver.getValue(BeanELResolver.java:261)
... 109 more
{noformat}

This basically can occur for a number of reasons:

The review refers to a file revision that:

1)  That hasn't been cached yet (The repository is in the middle of a re-index)
2) That used to exist, but no longer exists because the repo config had changed (added an exclude, etc)
3) That used to exist, but no longer exists because they have pointed their repo at a different svn url, but kept the same name, etc
fields.summary: Review throws 500 error NPE

fields.description: Now that the sql database is no longer used solely by crucible, rename all user-facing strings that currently refer to the database as "crucible" to "sql" or just "database".
fields.summary: Rename "crucibledb" to "sql"

fields.description:
Installed the 1.0 eclipse plugin today and tried to start doing reviews from eclipse. As I started running queries against the crucible Mylan repository I started seeing a log of the following errors:

java.lang.NullPointerException
        at com.atlassian.crucible.spi.impl.DefaultRepositoryService.createRepositoryData(DefaultRepositoryService.java:119)
        at com.atlassian.crucible.spi.impl.DefaultRepositoryService.getRepositories(DefaultRepositoryService.java:52)
        at com.atlassian.crucible.spi.rpc.RestRepositoryService$1.doGet(RestRepositoryService.java:53)
        at com.atlassian.crucible.spi.rpc.RestRepositoryService$1.doGet(RestRepositoryService.java:52)
        at com.atlassian.crucible.spi.rpc.ConditionalGet.doConditionalGet(ConditionalGet.java:46)
        at com.atlassian.crucible.spi.rpc.RestRepositoryService.getAllRepositories(RestRepositoryService.java:51)

I have not been able to pull across a full review yet (I did get one incomplete review... no files but the header seemed to be there)
fields.summary: NPE When using eclipse plugin

fields.summary: Email Review throws exception when you have comments that have blocks of whitespace

fields.description: it goes to fullscreen fine, but going back to normal is broken - you cant see the comments / participants section in the top left, and you can no longer scroll in the frx dir tree
fields.summary: fullscreen mode doesnt work on winxp ff3.0.10

fields.description: Result is that reviews created through the connector do not include the default reviewer.
fields.summary: Default Reviewer for project is not exposed through the SPI

fields.description: Prevent setting a due date in the past.
fields.summary: overdue but review has not been started. Setting a due date in the past causes this.

fields.description:
When making comments on a review simultaneously, no one can see them until after the page is refreshed.

Customers would like to see an AJAX version of this that works like Google docs.

Their method of doing code reviews is to have everyone do them at the same time, so live updates would be useful in this case.
fields.summary: AJAX comments

fields.description:
The review page automatically pops up the Manage Files dialog if there are no frxs in the reviews.

As a consequence, when you don't select anything and just close the dialog, the page refreshes and the dialog pops up again.
Also, more importantly, I accidentally created a new empty review in the incorrect project and now I'm unable to abandon it until I have added at least one irrelevant revision.
fields.summary: Empty reviews cannnot be abandoned/closed/viewed

fields.description: https://extranet.atlassian.com/crucible/cru/CR-FE-1569/#c15216
fields.summary: Create Enum for state transitions in changeStateAjax
Refactor Email Comments Page into a Dialog
fix remove file behaviour of current content panel
Use newDirTreeBox in the files pane
Fix Uploads

fields.description: The send-email page tries to load files that don't exist (e.g. http://host:port/crucible/cru/CR-CLOV-130/allcommentsemail)
fields.summary: Missing css files on Send Email page / Layout needs love
some changesets (on empty database) cause permaid error when used to create a review
fix suggest reviewer ui

fields.description:
Please see attached screenshot

Having this would make it easier for litescm plugins to choose a different diff to since diff to does not work for light SCM plugins (see [CRUC-885|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CRUC-885].
fields.summary: Add "Change Diff" button for file revision chosen from Light SCM plugins similar to files chosen from Fisheye Repositories

fields.description:
Together with Jeff Turner I have just come to the conclusion (https://support.atlassian.com/browse/JST-1109) that Crucible apparently does not send out notifications for comments added via REST API (e.g. from Eclipse Connector).
The same comments added via web UI trigger notifications without any issues.

I was able to reproduce it with my local 1.6.4 installation.
General, revision and line comments - all have the same issue.
fields.summary: Review comments and replies added via REST API do not trigger e-mail notifications
suggest reviewers - turn blame calculation back on

fields.description: http://img.skitch.com/20090420-6u9j2u4uucukqiry2ujfe3j5t.jpg
fields.summary: defect metrics charts are broken
.png file not detected as binary
Email Review button from the dashboard doesnt work  / Email review in tols menu gives a 404 - permaid is undefined
clicking HELP opens help twice   / Help in Tools menu will open a new window and change your window
page load error "The requested URL /atlaseye/static/kidi0j/2static/script/fe/fisheye-profile.js was not found on this server."
wrong review actions (comments.txt and Email Review) are visible
we need to handle multiple errors in a smarter way
There is no jira quick link in the edit review dialog
Review info popup on the dashboard shouldn't show when clicking on a link such as the review permaId
Page load error "The requested URL /atlaseye/static/kidi0j/2static/images/sprite_arrows.png was not found on this server"

fields.description: The Rest API of "Get Reviews by Path" and "Get Review Details by Path"  weren't implemented till Crucible version 1.6.\*. Hence, it should remove from the [Crucible 1.5.* documentation|http://confluence.atlassian.com/display/CRUCIBLE015/Review+Service#ReviewService-GetReviewsbyPath].
fields.summary: Remove "Get Reviews by Path" and "Get Review Details by Path" from Crucible 1.5 documention
External dialog 'View ...' links need to redirect to review and trigger filter
Show current content panel in manage files
make the side filters like the fisheye tabs
bring back the custom filter
make the pages consistent
Add warnings for incomplete FRXs and unresolved JIRAs to dialogs
Move review summary form into a dialog.
Move creation-time review suggestions into a dialog
Convert project selection screen to a dialog

fields.description: See: https://extranet.atlassian.com/crucible/cru/CR-FE-1578/#c15330
fields.summary: Remove driver url parameter from Restore and use new DBInfo properties

fields.description:
http://skitch.com/craig.sharkie/bcj2e/cr-fe-1465-fe-1346-open-settings-pages-in-ajs.dialog-under-review

There are two issues:
1) Where the old form selects used "this" in the JavaScript that was called from an onChange, the new AUI drop-downs don't have values as a property. Please update the functions to utilise the values being passed in the parameters, and
2) It seems the binding is dropping off elements earmarked as AUI drop-downs when they are being moved to the UI, Context, Whitespace and Diff layout are being affected. Can you please rebind these?
fields.summary: Upgrade Review toolbar select JavaScripts to work with AUI drop-downs

fields.description:
From CR-FE-1543:

{{AJS.CRU.REVIEW.UTIL.filterAndExpandFrxs}} invokes {{click}} events, which makes it hard to tell what is happening.

Instead, refactor the handlers and this method to call common code.
fields.summary: Refactor programatic frx filtering to not invoke click events
JSP tag to join a collection

fields.description:
Method needs
- to have a default size
- limit the max size to the viewport (minus some margin)
fields.summary: Utility method for AJS dialog size calculation

fields.description:
Add a base path textfield to the scheduled backups page to let the user control where backups are created. Also add a filename field to the on-demand Create Backup page.
This issue requires quartz to support persistent job data.
fields.summary: Add path and base filename to backup UI
Put patches back in place
move stats etc to a side bar
make the review list a table
update crucible project dashboard
